entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, McBride
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers in the morning and 70 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to a few flurries late in the evening. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023
